Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, south of Wakarimasu Park.
Room.LongDescription: The Kobiyo Observatory, located to the north on the grounds of the Wakarimasu Park, is one of the few scientific stations dedicated towards astronomy and astrophysics. Very few people have time to deal with such trivialities in everyday life, but it is somewhat interesting to visit every so often.
